title: Analysis and Optimization Design of Language Classroom Material Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate English communication skills and basic proficiency in instructional material utilization
context.additional_context: Textbook analysis and lesson design practice in environments with access to digital devices (laptops/tablets)

learning_goals: At least three adaptive material utilization strategies in language lesson design can be explained through textbook case studies
Material usage patterns (MUA) can be visualized as maps by analyzing observational and interview data
Instructional design revision plans can be created to improve material utilization methods based on formative assessment results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
